name: Trong Hieu
description: '''Trong Hieu Nguyen''' ({{Langx|vi|italic=no|Nguyễn Trọng Hiếu}}; born 4 July 1992), known professionally as '''Trong Hieu''' or simply '''Trong''' (stylised in [[all caps]]), is a German singer and dancer of [[Vietnamese people in Germany|Vietnamese descent]]. He is known for winning the [[Vietnam Idol#Season 6 (2015)|sixth season]] of ''[[Vietnam Idol]]'' in 2015.
